/usr/bin/c++   -march=native -Wno-deprecated -std=c++0x -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/application-GLFW.dir/application.cpp.o  -o bin/lin-x86_64/application-GLFW  -L/home/kronos/Downloads/chai3d-master/external/DHD/lib/lin-x86_64 -Wl,-rpath,/home/kronos/Downloads/chai3d-master/external/DHD/lib/lin-x86_64 build/libchai3d.a -lGL -lGLU -ldrd -lusb-1.0 -lrt -lpthread -ldl build/extras/GLFW/libglfw.a -lGL -lGLU -lX11 -lXcursor -lXrandr -lXinerama -ldrd -lusb-1.0 -lrt -lpthread -ldl -lX11 -lXcursor -lXrandr -lXinerama
